headline: Fortinet Q4 Beat, Cloud Progress And Buybacks Shape Valuation Story
summary: Fortinet reported a strong fourth quarter with revenue and billings growth that exceeded prior expectations. The company outlined optimistic guidance for 2026 alongside continued progress in its cloud security portfolio, including FortiCNAPP. Fortinet expanded its share repurchase authorization, signaling an increased focus on returning capital to shareholders. For investors tracking NasdaqGS:FTNT, the recent update comes with the stock trading at $82.76. The share price is up 6.3% year to...

headline: Assessing Fortinet (FTNT) Valuation After Mixed Recent Returns And Long Term Outperformance
summary: Why Fortinet is on investors’ radar today Fortinet (FTNT) has drawn attention after recent trading, with the stock closing at $82.76 and showing mixed returns over the past year, month and past 3 months. Investors are reassessing what the current price implies. See our latest analysis for Fortinet. The recent 4.85% 1 day share price return and 6.27% year to date share price return sit alongside a 23.13% 1 year total shareholder return decline. The 3 and 5 year total shareholder returns of...
